name: Mad Fox Bubble Shooter - Fire and Jewel Free for Heroes TV Edition
name_original: Mad Fox Bubble Shooter - Fire and Jewel Free for Heroes TV Edition
description:
This is classic bubble shooter game. Make combinations of 3 same colors or more bubbles to make them burst. Roxy Foxy is love to play in the snow with her bubbles. Help her to reach her goals.

FEATURES:
- SHOOT & MATCH bubbles
- EXPLORE over 100+ levels, each with uniquely challenging new puzzles and obstacles
- CHALLENGE yourself with 2 different game types
- SELECT and use amazing special boosters
- STUNNING graphics & adorable animations

How to play:
1.It's easy, just select the heading and tap to shoot.
2.To group 3 same colors or more bubbles to make them burst.
Tips: Breaking the bubbles continuously can get points as bonus.
